subject: Hydraulic rods for order
description_text:
Hello from the picture u can see my order number and that is was placed
today but I didnt realize I ordered the pedals and it says I don't get the
hydraulic rods with the set and if that's the case I would like to order 2
1 for throttle and 1 for brake for the plus x pedals if possible to ship
with my order

conversations.body_text: I have found the hydraulics on ur site and placed a order for them the order number is SSN2406 can u pls ship with order i plced threw amazon if possible if not on thier own is fine i would just perfer to get all the same day    Thankyou  307-4103 crosland plc  Duncan bc  Canada   V9l 0j7  James skeoch
